amendment.description: An amendment numbered 424 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to repeal the Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A049) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 180 (Roll no. 464).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A049) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 180 (Roll no. 464).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A049) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
